name: The mutton horn - Jump jump!
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Overcoming all difficulties, fly only forward! And so that does not happen, do not give up! This is the message of the game: The mutton horn - Jump jump!

Jump higher and higher, collecting scattered around the coins. Avoiding obstacles, calculating the further flight trajectory, this is the only way to reach the end.

The mutton horn - Jump jump! Is a test that not everyone can do.

Remember, there are many dangers around, and it's worthwhile to be more careful when choosing the path!

Only by collecting the right amount of coins, you can restore universal justice! Adventures are waiting!
